invalid_unfollow_req_rdr: Requests to unfollow a feed must be JSON containing a url field.
feed_exists_rdr: Requested feed at {{.URL}} is already being followed.
database_init_error_rdr: Could not establish a connection to the database. Error: {{.Error}}
db_store_error_rdr: Could not update the database. Error: {{.Error}}
insertion_fail_err: Failed to insert feeds list into Freenet.
bundle_fail_err: Failed to created a bundle for {{.Url}}.
invalid_report_err: Could not convert the information provided into an error query. Error: {{.Error}}
feed_delete_err_rdr: Encountered an error unfollowing the specified feed. Error: {{.Error}}
invalid_follow_req_rdr: The data you supplied describing the feed you want to follow is not appropriate.  Please consult the readerAPI.md document.
listening_msg_rdr: The reader server is listening on localhost{{.Port}}.
req_handle_success_rdr: Your request to follow a new feed has been handled successfully.
method_not_impl_rdr: This endpoint does not handle requests with the method you specified.
not_followed_feed_err: Got items from the feed at {{.URL}} that is not being followed.
json_decode_err: Could not decode the provided JSON. Error: {{.Error}}
invalid_config_rdr: The configuration file provided contains invalid data or formatting.
no_config_rdr: No configuration file could be read from {{.Location}}.
